meanings.definition: Of or relating to a quadrant.
meanings.sent1: The quadrantal measurement helped us understand the quadrant better.
meanings.sent2: The quadrantal angle was crucial in solving the geometry problem.
meanings.sent3: The quadrantal division of the pizza made it easy for everyone to get a fair share.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a quadrantal ray of sunshine, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The quadrantal shape of the garden gave it a unique and organized look.

meanings.definition: Located in or forming a quarter of a circle or sphere.
meanings.sent1: The quadrantal area of the pie was the most delicious.
meanings.sent2: We sat in the quadrantal section of the park, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent3: The quadrantal slice of cake disappeared in seconds at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the room, filling every quadrantal corner with joy.
meanings.sent5: The quadrantal position of the moon in the sky was mesmerizing.
